IN THE COURT OF MR TARIQ RASHEED QAMAR JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE SEC.30 PS MAZANG, LAHORE
APPLICATION FOR CANCELLATION OF NON BAILABLE WARRANT OF THE COMPLAINANT NAMELY- MALIK GUL ZAMAN, ORDER DATED: 23.05.2022
1. That the above titled suit is fixed before this Honourable Court on 17.07.2023.
2. That Non-Bailable Warrants were issued against Prosecution witnesses namely- Applicant/PW1/Malik Gul Zaman, and others, for attendance before the Honourable Court to give evidence.

3. That the reason for non-compliance with the requirements of issued Warrants over a period was that Applicant/PW1/Malik Gul Zaman did not receive any notice of the issued warrants either at home or through the principal counsel in the case. Therefore, a new counsel is appointed in this case due to necessity to curb any further non-compliance of the orders.

3. That Applicant/PW1/ Malik Gul Zaman is ready to surrender before the Honourable Court as per the warrants. Therefore, it is humbly requested that the non-bailable warrants may be cancelled against the Applicant/PW1/Malik Gul Zaman and next date may be fixed for his appearance due to his ill health.

In the above-mentioned circumstances, it is prayed that Non-Bailable Warrants may be cancelled against Applicant/PW1/Malik Gul Zaman and a new date may be fixed for his presentation in the interest of justice, fair play, and equity.
IN THE COURT OF MR TARIQ RASHEED QAMAR JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE SEC.30 PS MAZANG, LAHORE
APPLICATION FOR CANCELLATION OF NON BAILABLE WARRANT OF THE COMPLAINANT NAMELY- MALIK GUL ZAMAN, ISSUED VIDE ORDER DATED: 23.05.2022
AFFIDAVIT OF: MALIK GUL ZAMAN S/o Malik Mumtaz Ali, Resident of 786/A, Block F, Street 1, Rana Market, Ali Park, Lahore Cantt, Lahore.
